dataList.dlg: Welcome aboard, dearest passengers!!! I. Have. Arrived!!!
Like the first train breaking the dawn, I shall rush forth with ever-constant vigor!
To think that the company provideth midday meals…! I am infatuated! I would remain employed here for eons if I could!
I have done mine utmost to take notes during today’s meeting! Behold, I have utilized a great variety of colors to illuminate the writing! With stars and flowers and…
Have you ridden one of W Corp’s trains, Manager Esquire? Not once?! Hold it, I… Give me a moment.
What do you think of going on a train trip together, Manager Esquire? I’ll pack our lunch!
Have you seen Mistress Rodya anywhere? I promised her earlier that I would give her an extensive lecture on the history of W Corp, yet she’s nowhere to be found!
Manager Esquire, is it just me, or is this metallic odor tingling my nose prevalent in the air?
Did you know that human life is more resilient than it seems? One may still be breathing even after suffering profuse bleeding and breaking most of one’s bones.
…and that is how the achievements of W Corp. came to be widely kno— Hm? Manager Esquire?
Will I finally be given an important task?!
Here we go!
I shall rush ahead as would a train!
I’m always ready to speed forward!
None shall stop me!
Now seems to be our chance!
Urk!
Where to next?!
Manager Esquire! I’ll count on you once this is over!
Manager Esquire! I did a rather impressive job, did I not?
I am terribly sorry, it was vital that I succeed…
Now THERE is a valuable asset to the company!
Have I become a so-called elite?! Promote me, Manager Esquire!
I… shan’t ever give up…
